_header: I receive no light but of thy beams bright
_description: Leconfield proverbs — five lines on a scroll attached to a picture of Christ[?]

BLRoy18Dii.Transcription: I receyue noo lighte but of thy bearmes brighteThe leight beneuolent causith cor to relent for remembryngethy goodenes contenuall which remanith perpetuallCor cannot but of dutie he muste distill yet he saith dutiecannot recompence a cordinge too his goode will
